card_text: Target 1 Machine monster you control; apply the following effect depending on its battle position.$N●Attack Position: Special Summon 1 "Morphtronic" monster from your Deck with a different name than that targeted monster, then place that targeted monster on top of the Deck.$N●Defense Position: Change that targeted monster to Attack Position, and if you do, Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower Machine monster from your hand.$NYou can only activate 1 "Morphtronic Converter" per turn.
